title: Quarkus 3.3.2 released - Maintenance release
content: Today, we released Quarkus 3.3.2, our second maintenance release for our 3.3 release train. It includes a bunch of bugfixes, together with documentation improvements. The startup performance/memory regression introduced in 3.3 mentioned in the 3.3.1 announcement should be fixed in this version. Update To update to Quarkus 3.3.2, we recommend...
